plot: One hour TV special of the three night live music event at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival with acoustic performances by 12 Warner Brothers artists, including Josh Groban, Michelle Branch, Jason Mraz, Jack's Mannequin and Missy Higgins.
title: Where Music Meets Film
plot_es: One hour TV special of the three night live music event at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival with acoustic performances by 12 Warner Brothers artists, including Josh Groban, Michelle Branch, Jason Mraz, Jack's Mannequin and Missy Higgins.
plot_en: One hour TV special of the three night live music event at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival with acoustic performances by 12 Warner Brothers artists, including Josh Groban, Michelle Branch, Jason Mraz, Jack's Mannequin and Missy Higgins.
